Articles.Content:
I've discovered the perpetual motion engine.... My Mechjeb Module continues to tumble along the ground after the remains of the ship it was sent up with failed... Horribly. Fortunately, the MechJeb modules's resilience means that observers can measure how far it ends up before it either destructs( not likely) or stops.

Note: afrter 5 mins, the module continues to tumble along Kerbin's surface.... Going to update this thread after I wake up tomorrow and confirm the bug.

Edited April 24, 2014 by Fizwalker
Spelling
Alrighty.... This morning showed that the module happily tumbling along fell into the ocean and blew up....
